entry.title: 300 Gram [5 Packets] "Dry & Dry" Premium Pure & Safe Silica Gel Desiccant Packets - Rechargeable Fabric
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 16.99

 

  • Packet dimension : 4.5" x 8"
  • Silica Gel Beads Size : about 2 ~ 4 mm
  • Silica Gel Beads Color : Clear White.
  • 30+ YEAR EXPERIENCE in the Industry of Silica Gel Desiccant
  • Premium Quality Pure and Safe Silica Gel without Cobalt Chloride
  • ULTIMATE MOISTURE ABSORPTION & REACTIVATION - Packet Material is Special Fabric by Spunbond Technology for "Ultimate Moisture Absorption" and "Heat Resistance for Reuse".
  • SPECIAL THICKNESS - Packets are stored in RESEALABLE Self-Standing High Quality Bag for Easy Storage and Use - Newly Designed Air Tight Sealing & Sturdy Bag for Moisture Control.
  • REACTIVATION - Packets can be Reactivated by Heating in an Oven for 0.5-2.0 hours at 200-250 F Or Microwave for 10 Minutes at DEFROST.
  • Note: 70 Packets are stored in box(Bulk Packaging)
  • 100 % SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - 100% Refund or New Replacement BEYOND REFUND PERIOD if you are not happy with our product.(See Our Customers' Reviews-World Wide Best Seller) .
